id: The Wall Street JournalOpinionThe October Surprise Arrives
paragraph:
November 17, 2018It looks as if the 2018 election’s October Surprise is about to arrive—from Honduras. There they are—all 7,000 or so of them meandering across Mexico, on television 24/7 and the front pages every day. Unavoidably, everyone is forced to shape an opinion about it. Unavoidably, it’s political. Most media coverage runs on two joined tracks....
